caption.p: ( A) The PL and PLE spectra of CLSO:Dy 3+ and CLSO:Sm 3+ phosphors. ( B) The linear fitting of I SO/I S of Dy 3+ versus C n/3 in CLSO:0.20Dy 3+/ySm 3+ (y = 0–0.32) phosphors. ( C) The plotting of η T versus Sm 3+ ion concentration. ( D) Decay curves of Dy 3+ in CLSO:0.20Dy 3+ phosphor excited at 365 nm monitored at 479 nm (I) and 573 nm (II); (III) decay curve of Sm 3+ in CLSO:0.20Sm 3+ phosphor excited at 365 nm monitored at 601; decay curves of CLSO:0.20Dy 3+/0.20Sm 3+ phosphor excited at 365 nm monitored at 479 nm (IV), 573 nm (V) and 601 nm (VI).
